alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 10 at 3:15PM MDT until April 13 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 3 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with locally higher amounts especially in the upper Cottonwoods. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From noon Monday to 3 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on all area routes. Traction restrictions may be enacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow accumulations are possible Tuesday night into Wednesday morning, especially in areas favorable to northwest flow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains
